nodes.text: Mega Go was a juice served in a small box with a bendy straw. The box had a picture of a fruit on its side. The juice was potable to Humans. Sometime between 0 ABY and 3 ABY, the Human stormtrooper Bob had a Mega Go on a bench in a mess hall during his lunch break.
Mega Go appeared in "Lunch Break," a comic written and illustrated by Jonathan Adams and released in the sixteenth issue of Star Wars Tales, published on June 25, 2003.
